Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 06:57PM Sandy26 wrote: So sorry you have to become a member of our little club. I was diagnosed this June (2007) with breast cancer... I am 26 years old. I did IV chemo therapy for 4 months and had a double mastectomy on Oct 12th. I am in the process of going through reconstruction with expanders. The chemo didn't work as the doctor's had hoped...so as preventive measures I am taking tamoxifin for 5 years and another round of chemo (xeloda) for 4 months. I have made it through everything just fine so far and didn't have too many crazy side effects of anything. Hang in there!
Posts.Title: just diagnosed and SCARED!!! ilenee ilenee
